citeinfo.title: Progress map of the State of New Jersey, 1880.
citeinfo.othercit: Alternate title: Progress map of the State of New Jersey, 1880. From U.S. Coast Survey records, N.J. geological and topographical surveys and various local surveys to date. Another copy with source publication. Shows primary and secondary triangulation sites, meteorological stations, and iron mines.

descript.abstract: The historical map of New Jersey published originally by the Geological Survey of New Jersey was scanned, georeferenced and reprojected to the New Jersey State Plane Coordinate System, NAD 83 using ERDAS IMAGINE software.
descript.purpose: The georeferenced historical geological map can be used as layers in geographic information systems and can extract historical information.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.0.0.535

citeinfo.title: Geological Map of New Jersey: From the Original Surveys

serinfo.sername: New Jersey Geological Survey Atlas Sheets

procstep.procdesc: The historical New Jersey Geological Atlas Sheets were originally scanned at 600 dpi using an Altek VIDAR large format scanner. The scanned maps were saved in a single layer tiff format at 16 million colors. Color correction and adaptive color level balancing was done in Adobe Photoshop 6.0. This process was done at the New Jersey Environmental Digital Library (NJEDL) , Rutgers University. The original maps were FTP in TIFF LZW format from the New Jersey Digital Environmental Library (NJDEL) to the Digital Map and Geospatial Information Center, Princeton University Library. Later The TIFF LZW files were opened in the IrfanView software, version 3.80 and resaved as non-compressed TIFF file. The TIFF files were georeferenced first using ArcView 3.2a Image Analysis software. On each map, the four corners and two middle graticules were used to georeference the maps, and later the TIFF file was reprojected to the New Jersey State Plane Coordinate System, NAD 83 using ERDAS IMAGINE software 8.6.

cntaddr.addrtype: REQUIRED: The mailing and/or physical address for the organization or individual.
cntaddr.city: REQUIRED: The city of the address.
cntaddr.state: REQUIRED: The state or province of the address.
cntaddr.postal: REQUIRED: The ZIP or other postal code of the address.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
